Package com.symyx.draw

Interface Summary
JDrawComponent Interface for the class that renders or edits structures (molecules and reactions) in an applet or application.
JDrawPreferences Interface for display preference settings such as how to show background color, foreground color, implicit hydrogens, bond length.
 

Class Summary
Editor Editor class for use in an application.
ImageGenerator Class that paints an image of a molecule or reaction to the image object you have written.
JDrawEditor Class for editing structures (molecules and reactions) in an applet, which can also have a renderer: see JDrawRenderer.
JDrawRenderer Class for rendering structures (molecules and reactions) in an applet, which can also have an structure editor: see JDrawEditor.
Renderer Renderer class for use in an application.
